name: Php Crud
tagline: Are you are looking for a php crud ?
body:
# Booyaah â˜º

## Whats is a crud?
 CRUD is a series of steps or actions to be performed with certain data , here use a table with columns that include certain data, a crud is to add , edit , update and delete data , that simple

## What Have used?
* [ Atom](https://atom.io/download/windows)
* [ Materializecsss](http://materializecss.com)
* [ Xampp] (https://www.apachefriends.org)

## How to connnect ... with database :o
`<?php
  $con = mysqli_connect('host','username','password','dbname');
  if (!$con) {
    die("Has been a error to connect db".mysqli_connect_error());
  }`
## Finally!
 It's All , download the files and a php server and test.

## Have questions?
 This project is easy , but but you can contact @briangnz

# It's the end . . . of the line :v
 It's all guys , download the project :)
